:node-props.description_zh: 选项的 DOM 属性生成函数

:options.description: Configure the option content, see [Select](select#SelectOption-Properties) for details.
:options.description_zh: 配置选项内容，详情参考 [Select](select#SelectOption-Properties)

scrollable.description: Whether the popover content is scrollable

:render-label.description: Controls the rendering of all options

animated.description: Use animations when pop-ups pop up

arrow-point-to-center.description: Whether the arrow points to the center of the triggering element
arrow-point-to-center.description_zh: 箭头是否指向触发元素中心

:content-style.description: The style of the popover content

:delay.description: Hovering triggers a delay in popping up information
:delay.description_zh: 悬浮触发弹出信息的延迟

disabled.description: Whether the pop-up message cannot be activated
disabled.description_zh: 是否不能激活弹出信息

display-directive.description: Conditional rendering uses directives, 'if' will make the content be rendered using 'v-if', and 'show' will make the content be rendered using 'v-show'
display-directive.description_zh: 条件渲染使用的指令，`if` 会让内容被使用 `v-if` 渲染，`show` 会让内容被使用 `v-show` 渲染

:duration.description: Hovering turns off the delay of pop-up messages
:duration.description_zh: 悬浮关闭弹出信息的延迟

flip.description: Whether to adjust the position of the pop-up message when the current placement method does not provide enough space
flip.description_zh: 是否在当前放置方式不能提供足够空间的时候调整弹出信息的位置

keep-alive-on-hover.description: Whether to keep the popover displayed when the trigger is hover
keep-alive-on-hover.description_zh: 是否在 trigger 为 hover 的时候，悬浮在 popover 时保持 popover 显示

placement.type: top-start / top / top-end / right-start / right / right-end / bottom-start / bottom / bottom-end / left-start / left / left-end /

raw.description: Whether to add a default style

show-arrow.description: Whether or not to display arrows

show.description: Whether or not to display a popover

to.description: The destination container location of the pop-up content, 'false' will stay where it is
to.description_zh: 弹出内容的目标容器位置，`false` 会待在原地

width.description: trigger indicates that the width of the popover will be the same as its trigger element
width.description_zh: trigger 表示 popover 的宽度会和它的触发元素一致

:x.description: The pixel value of the CSS 'left' of the pop-up content when manually controlling the position (x,y are both set to take effect)
:x.description_zh: 手动控制位置时弹出内容的 CSS `left` 的像素值（x，y 都设置才能生效）

:y.description: The pixel value of the CSS 'top' of the pop-up content when manually controlling the position (x,y are set to take effect)
:y.description_zh: 手动控制位置时弹出内容的 CSS `top` 的像素值（x，y 都设置才能生效）

SelectOption.name: class
SelectOption.description: 自定义一个选项的类名

SelectOption.name: label
SelectOption.description: 选项的标签，注意如果你使用了渲染函数，默认的过滤器将会过滤该选项

SelectOption.name: render
SelectOption.type: (info: { node: VNode, option: SelectOption, selected: boolean }) => VNodeChild

SelectOption.name: style
SelectOption.description: 自定义一个选项的样式

SelectOption.name: value
SelectOption.description: 在选项中应该是唯一的

SelectGroupOption.name: key
SelectGroupOption.description: 在选项中应该是唯一的

SelectGroupOption.name: render
SelectGroupOption.type: (info: { node: VNode, option: SelectOption, selected: boolean }) => VNodeChild

events.name: update:value
events.params: (value: string | number | Array<string | number> | null, option: SelectBaseOption | null | Array<SelectBaseOption>) => void

events.name: clickoutside
events.description_zh: clickoutside 时触发的回调函数

events.name: update:show
events.description: A callback function that displays a state change
events.description_zh: 显示状态改变的回调函数
